@Scroobiuspipyo Hey man. I'm an MMA journalist and was just curious, do you do any coverage of the sport anymore?
@kevdcoffey Obsessed is right. This crusade he's leading about illegal voters is unbelievable. You won, Donny. Let it go.

President-Elect Donald Trump who, don't forget, was once the recipient of a Stone Cold Stunner, is moments away from assuming the presidency
You'd suspect that if Melania was capable of human emotion she would find this event quite moving.
Why does Melania look like she's walking to the gallows?
